name: affiliated
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
connected with or controlled by a group or organization: She was admitted into the Chicago Medical School, then affiliated with Northwestern University. He resigned as chairman of the Petra Group and as director of its affiliated companies.
US used to refer to people who state that they support a particular political party when they register to vote: The button marked "Other" was intended for Republicans and other affiliated voters. Compare
unaffiliated

Add to word list
Add to word list
used to describe an organization that is officially connected with or controlled by another, usually larger, organization: Affiliated retailers bought the product at the official price. Earlier this month an affiliated company filed for bankruptcy.
